actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of the 50th anniversary of the trans-Atlantic airplane flight of Charles A. Lindbergh.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of the fiftieth anniversary of the transatlantic airplane flight of Charles A. Lindbergh.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of the 50th anniversary of the trans-Atlantic airplane flight of Charles A. Lindbergh.
